name: unojs
description: An instrument for recording videos and capturing films to be sent to Jira, Zoho, etc.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run sass
scripts.sass: sass src/styles:dist/esm/css --no-source-map --style compressed && sass src/styles:dist/cjs/css --no-source-map --style compressed
